channel.title: CVE Feed for Milan Petrovic -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Milan Petrovic -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-46821|2024-09-05T15:35:47.001Z -- milan%20petrovic -- gd%20security%20headers
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Milan Petrovic GD Security Headers allows auth. (admin+) SQL Injection.This issue affects GD Security Headers: from n/a through 1.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-38709|2024-07-12T14:45:29.691Z -- milan%20petrovic -- gd%20rating%20system
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Milan Petrovic GD Rating System allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects GD Rating System: from n/a through 3.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-38709|2024-08-02T04:19:20.242Z -- milan%20petrovic -- gd%20rating%20system
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Milan Petrovic GD Rating System allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects GD Rating System: from n/a through 3.6.
